SEARCH
Package main.com.kulikov.Repository

Class UserRepository

java.lang.Object
main.com.kulikov.Repository.GenericRepository<User>
main.com.kulikov.Repository.UserRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
Repository<User>
@Repository public class UserRepository extends GenericRepository<User>
The UserRepository class provides methods for accessing and manipulating user data in the database. It extends the GenericRepository class and implements specific functionality for user-related operations.
Since:
2024-05-16

    • existsByUsername

      public boolean existsByUsername(String username)
      Checks if a user with the specified username exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to check for existence.
      Returns:
      True if a user with the username exists, otherwise false.

      Checks if a user with the specified email exists in the database.

      Returns:
